channel.title: Simple 500+ client and source?
channel.description:
So, I'm interested in starting up a 500+ server and had no luck with PDF and looking for something that's is kind of simple and doesn't have millions of different features.
I'm aiming to create something similar to the old 317 server with edge pking and such and removing the OP stuff such as overloads etc..
Suggestions?

item.title: Simple 500+ client and source?
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

I’d suggest using bulby’s 508. Its not the best but its 508 and reasonably easy to get to grips with, I’d suggest avoiding anything higher than 525 otherwise you will have errors and spam this section

Read full topic
